snippet: Los Angeles battered the Anaheim rookie goalie John Gibson for four goals in the first 23 minutes..
abstract: NHL Roundup; Los Angeles Kings beat Anaheim Ducks, 6-2, in Game 7 of second-round playoff series and advance to their third straight Western Conference finals; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles battered the Anaheim rookie goalie John Gibson for four goals in the first 23 minutes..

headline.main: Kings Reach Conference Finals Again In a Rout
headline.print_headline: Kings Reach Conference Finals Again In a Rout
